# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/react`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for React (http://facebook.github.io/react/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped.git/tree/master/types/react

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Tue, 08 May 2018 16:46:27 GMT
 * Dependencies: csstype
 * Global values: React
